desc: Today, citizens of all nations are still able to watch the situation from the comfort of their homes. Their peace is possible because Ukraine is a shield for the whole world. You can help ukrainians right now!

layout.text: WE ARE ANNOUNCING A SUBSCRIPTION FOR FUNDRAISING FOR THE LIQUIDATION OF THE HUMANITARIAN DISASTER IN UKRAINE

The devastating eruption of war in Ukraine is driving hundreds of thousands of families from their homes and into hunger. Survivors have lost everything and urgently need our help. The CHARITY FUND HUMANITARIAN AID TO UKRAINE, CORP. is on the ground right now providing critical food assistance for people fleeing the conflict. With your help, we can deliver food directly to Ukrainian people in dire need. You can make a lifesaving difference today: $100 can provide a family with an emergency box containing enough food for an entire month. Make your 100% tax-deductible emergency contribution now!
